column1: Morocco have secured their place in the knockout phase of the World Cup for the first time since 1986
column2: after winning their second consecutive game at Qatar 2022. Despite being pushed back by a stronger Canada side in the second half
column3: the Atlas Lions held firm and topped their group
column4: becoming the second African nation to progress. They will now face a team from Group E
column6: and their determined attitude could make them a formidable opponent.
